src:
Man City Ditunggu Liverpoo, Guardiola Tidak Punya Rencana Khusus?
04 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Josep Guardiola bersikeras tidak akan mengistirahatkan pemain-pemain kunci Manchester City pada duel tengah pekan ini sebelum menyambangi Liverpool akhir pekan nanti. Dia tidak menyiapkan rencana khusus untuk bermain di Anfield.
Man City bakal menyambangi Atalanta pada matchday 4 Liga Champions 2019/20, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB, lalu bertandang ke Anfield, Minggu (10/11/2019). Melihat posisi saat ini, duel di Anfield memang sangat penting.
Pertandingan antara dua tim terkuat di Premier League itu bisa saja berpengaruh pada persaingan merebut gelar juara musim ini. Sekarang Liverpool masih lebih unggul dengan 31 poin di puncak klasemen sementara, unggul 6 poin dari Man City.
Duel di Anfield nanti diyakini bakal sengit, tapi Man City punya masalah skuad yang tidak maksimal. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Man City Awaited by Liverpoo, Guardiola Don't Have a Special Plan?
Nov 04 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Josep Guardiola insisted he would not rest key Manchester City players in the midweek duel before visiting Liverpool this weekend. He did not prepare specific plans to play at Anfield.
Man City will visit Atalanta on Matchday 4 Champions League 2019/20, Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs, then travel to Anfield on Sunday (11/10/2019). Seeing the current position, the duel at Anfield is indeed very important.
The match between the two strongest teams in the Premier League could have an effect on competition to win the title this season. Now Liverpool are still superior with 31 points at the top of the standings, 6 points ahead of Man City.
Duel at Anfield will be believed to be fierce, but Man City has a squad problem that is not optimal. Read below, Bolaneters!
